title: The Pink Tax And Why It Costs More To Be a Woman (feat. Rep. Jackie Speier)
itunes:title: The Pink Tax And Why It Costs More To Be a Woman (feat. Rep. Jackie Speier)
description:
Roy Wood Jr. sits down with Correspondent Desi Lydic, The Daily Show Segment Director Stacey Angeles and Congresswoman Jackie Speier to discuss everyday examples of the pink tax.

Watch the original segment:

https://youtu.be/As2p2vsdrfk
